name: GKRTreeSplitStrategy
desc: Options that control how a tree balances its internal structure when adding elements, used with the addElement(_:boundingRectMin:boundingRectMax:splitStrategy:) method.

items.name: case halve
items.desc: An option to split groups of elements in half based on the order they were added to the tree in.

items.name: case linear
items.desc: An option to split groups of elements by finding a line that divides space so that half of the elements are on either side.

items.name: case quadratic
items.desc: An option to split groups of elements by finding the subgroups that occupy the least area.

items.name: case reduceOverlap
items.desc: An option to split groups of elements by finding the subgroups whose areas overlap the least.
